comments:
Linux Red Hat 7.2 KDE3 running eclipse-linux-x86-motif 2.1.3. Same EXACT 
configuration on different machines, but on certain ones it doesn't run. Same 
problem in eclipse 3.0 and other versions.

GG to investigate. Is this just Lesstif again?

RedHat 7.2 was not a supported platform, see the second table on 
http://eclipse.org/eclipse/development/eclipse_project_plan_2_1.html .

That being said, if there are some redhat 7.2 machines that this is working on 
(bonus) then this could be a case of using LessTif.  Although the error message 
is different, try the suggestion in http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%
7Echeckout%7E/platform-swt-home/faq.html#usingLesstif .
